body.name: NUROUM 2K Webcam with Microphone, 1080P/60fps, 1440P/30fps, Dual Microphone with Privacy Cover, Wide-Angle USB FHD Web Computer Camera, Plug and Play, for Zoom/Skype/Teams/Webex

features: 【2K Webcam with Noise Reduction Dual mics record】1440P/30fps or Full HD 1080P/60fps video, outputs crisp, natural true-to-life video with smooth motion. Dual mics record stereo audio with a voice pickup radius of 7ft, 90° circular-sector directional voice pickup technology blocks unwanted noises.

【USB Plug-and-play & 90 Degrees Wide View】The webcam is automatically recognized by the computer without the need to install software or drivers.Tripod-ready. Universal mounting clip fits laptops, LCD, or monitors. Multi-layers premium glass lens comes with 4M pixel CMOS to records up to 2K videos with fine-tuned colors and rich details.

【High Compatibility & Multi Application】Compatible with desktop or laptop computers w/ Windows, macOS, Linux, ChromeOS, and Android (device depends),Works with conference platforms like Zoom, Skype, Slack, Google Hangouts, etc. and remote learning/teaching platforms , If you want live streaming, you can use Swift Capture, Xsplit, OBS, and platforms like Twitch, Facebook Live, YouTube Live/Gaming, Vimeo Livestream, and more.

【Low Dependence on Light Condition& Protection of your privacy】Always look great with V11's intelligent exposure control and automatic low-light correction features. Inbuilt privacy cover and LED indicate to show real-time working status of the camera so that your privacy is always under your control.
【Download your Updated Version Conviently】Firmware updating brings constant performance promotion and new functions. Apps are available on Nuroum official website for both Windows & macOS!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked perfectly. PNP out of the box. Like another one I have but with built-in shutter.
reviews.reviewText: This is an inexpensive but quality camera. It is plug-and-play (Windows 10). I needed it for my docked notebook. Replaces an older one that (different brand, same shape and dimensions) that had a separate lens cover that broke but that I can use for a travel-meeting camera. Looks like an upgraded version of my old one, but with the build in shutter and a better mount. Only used it once, but very clear HD image is fine for my home office and should suffice for the office environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good webcam
reviews.reviewText: I was thoroughly impressed. For the price I was not expecting the highest quality but I must say this product definitely surprised me. Easy installation and setup. Using this for zoom/webex/teams/chime calls. At 1080p 30fps and the wide angle lenses my image was much clearer and sharper than my previous webcam and the built in cam on my laptop. I was told on last meeting I sound very clear versus built in mic on laptop which is a plus because before I was having to speak much more loudly than I normally do which made presenting awkward for me. Now I can do so more naturally. Great product for the price , you will not be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price. Don’t expect amazing.
reviews.reviewText: The Nuroum web cam is a fantastic option for those looking for an affordable camera with good privacy features. It was easy to set up and integrates well with OBS, making it a great choice for content creators on YouTube. The wide angle lens is a nice feature, allowing for a wider field of view in video calls and recordings.While the quality of the camera is not exceptional, it is certainly adequate for the price point. The only downside is that the camera seems to struggle with adjusting color and white balance, resulting in noticeable shifts during use. However, this is a minor issue and should not deter potential buyers from considering the Nuroum web cam.Overall, the Nuroum web cam is a great value for the price and is a solid choice for those in need of an affordable and reliable camera for video calls or content creation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for the money.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a replacement for a no-name brand I got on the web. So far, this has exceeded my expectation and most importantly, the microphone works very well. I'm quite happy with it. Great camera for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 1440p Webcam for under 30 dollar?
reviews.reviewText: So I bought this webcam after my Logitech C920 finally died out after 7 years. So I was looking for improvement in my video quality for my Youtube video content, and livestreams. However, I didnt have the budget to spend on a 4k DLSR setup. So off deal hunting I go! Well, this came across my search, and honestly I was just looking for a 1080p 60fps webcam. Well here are what the pros and cons are for this one.Pros- Price- 1440p 60fps (only says 30fps in listing shows up in OBS as 1440/60)- Privacy cover- Plug and Play ( I can only speak for its use in Linux (Garuda) specifically, but if its working there you can pretty much expect it to work in any OS)- Wide Viewing AngleCons- Default settings (Oh boy, so the short version, especially if you are a content creator, in OBS add color correction, and a color key filter to the source. For my case, it leaned really heavy to the blue end of the tint spectrum, so the image looked really dull, even with proper even lighting. Once that was adjusted the the image quality was good compared to even my Razer Kiyo I have as well.)- Wide Viewing Angle ( Can be a con for those looking for tighter focus)So once you get past the default settings and tweak them a bit you have found yourself a very capable webcam with some nice added surprises like 1440/60 that arent even advertised!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It has a very clear image but the colors are not as vivid as those when using a phone’s camera or an iPad. That said, it was very inexpensive and it works without any problems! I am happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: I don't use it for zoom and with klipper on my 3d printer and I don't have a need for it to zoom. Decent quality for the price it can be mounted on a camera stand. Not the best but good enough for time-lapse videos. It does require a decent amount of light to get a good picture although it will work in a little lower light but don't recommend it. I will get a better more expensive one for my time-lapse videos for my 3d printer in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect start up streamer camera!
reviews.reviewText: While this isn’t some high dollar streamer cam, it’s a fantastic starter. Set up is a breeze, and the quality is surprisingly really really good. With a lighting set up (or a well lit room) it’s about as good as my iPhones front camera. Pleasantly surprised, great for starter streamers

reviews.reviewTitle: Really Nice Cam for the Money
reviews.reviewText: Not much to say, Nice little cam. I like that it does not have a bunch of logo's on the front. As it is on the top of my monitor facing me. Looks nice and clean with the slide shutter cover. Native windows control works well. Clear and colors and low light are good. Can;t go wrong here the cord however isn't very long maybe 3 feet so that works well for laptop but you would need a cable extension for to connect to the back of your pc.
Fácil de instalar y cumple con lo esperado.
Wish it was a bit better for a webcam mic. I sound a bit tinny, and I hear echo

reviews.reviewTitle: Barato para algo básico y que cumple
reviews.reviewText: Está bien en general, cumple con la resolución, más sin embargo, no cuenta con zoom ajustable ni puedes configurar los colores, contrates, etc, no tiene tampoco auto enfoque, el audio que sale del micrófono es aceptable, en cuanto al vídeo si es necesario que tengas luz, pero por lo que cuesta no encontrarás algo mejor, y si es algo grande y el cable USB está integrado por lo que no podras cambiarlo si se llega a dañar

absolute trash, not 2k, barely knows what colours are.nexigo 1080p camera I bought 2 years ago blows this out of the water in every aspect.too lazy to return and pay price difference for a nexigo because it will suffice for my super basic use case for it. but absolute trash picture quality
